trans-unit.source: Sessions
trans-unit.target: Sessions

trans-unit.source: Sessions that have not updated for the last maxlifetime seconds will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 在最近的 maxlifetime 秒内未更新的会话将被删除。

trans-unit.source: Set →
trans-unit.target: 设置→

trans-unit.source: Set (class)
Set iseed1 and iseed2 as seed values to the random generator used in statistic functions.
trans-unit.target: 将 iseed1 和 iseed2 设置为统计函数中使用的随机生成器的种子值。

trans-unit.source: Set value to
trans-unit.target: 设定 value 来

trans-unit.source: Set Minimum "Should" Match parameter (mm). If the default query operator is AND then mm=100%, if the default query operator (q.op) is OR, then mm=0%.
trans-unit.target: 设置最小 "应该 "匹配参数(mm)。如果默认的查询操作符是AND,那么mm=100%,如果默认的查询操作符(q.op)是OR,那么mm=0%。

trans-unit.source: Set Query Alternate (q.alt parameter)
trans-unit.target: 设置备用查询(q.alt参数)

trans-unit.source: Set SSL behavior options, which is a bitmask of any of the following constants: CURLSSLOPT_ALLOW_BEAST: do not attempt to use any workarounds for a security flaw in the SSL3 and TLS1.0 protocols. CURLSSLOPT_NO_REVOKE: disable certificate revocation checks for those SSL backends where such behavior is present.
trans-unit.target: 设置SSL行为选项，该选项是以下任何常量的位掩码： CURLSSLOPT_ALLOW_BEAST ：不要尝试对SSL3和TLS1.0协议中的安全漏洞使用任何替代方法。 CURLSSLOPT_NO_REVOKE ：对存在此类行为的那些SSL后端禁用证书吊销检查。

trans-unit.source: Set a callback that will be called during the processing of the Imagick image.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个在处理Imagick图像时调用的回调。

trans-unit.source: Set a date according to the ISO 8601 standard - using weeks and day offsets rather than specific dates.
trans-unit.target: 根据ISO 8601标准设置日期--使用周和日偏移而不是具体日期。

trans-unit.source: Set a handler to be called when a namespace is declared. Namespace declarations occur inside start tags. But the namespace declaration start handler is called before the start tag handler for each namespace declared in that start tag.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个处理程序,以便在命名空间被声明时调用。命名空间声明发生在 start 标记中。但是,对于在该 start 标记中声明的每个命名空间,命名空间声明 start 处理程序会在 start 标记处理程序之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: Set a handler to be called when leaving the scope of a namespace declaration. This will be called, for each namespace declaration, after the handler for the end tag of the element in which the namespace was declared.
trans-unit.target: 设置离开命名空间声明的范围时要调用的处理程序。对于每个命名空间声明,该处理程序将在声明命名空间的元素的结束标签处理程序之后被调用。

trans-unit.source: Set a numeric attribute associated with the formatter. An example of a numeric attribute is the number of integer digits the formatter will produce.
trans-unit.target: 设置与格式化器相关联的数字属性。数字属性的一个例子是格式化器将产生的整数位数。

trans-unit.source: Set a parameter to request, which can be retrieved by Yaf_Request_Abstract::getParam()
trans-unit.target: 设置要请求的参数，可以通过Yaf_Request_Abstract :: getParam（）检索

trans-unit.source: Set a symbol associated with the formatter. The formatter uses symbols to represent the special locale-dependent characters in a number, for example the percent sign. This API is not supported for rule-based formatters.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个与格式器相关联的符号。格式化器使用符号来表示数字中与本地相关的特殊字符,例如百分号。基于规则的格式化器不支持此API。

trans-unit.source: Set a text attribute associated with the formatter. An example of a text attribute is the suffix for positive numbers. If the formatter does not understand the attribute, U_UNSUPPORTED_ERROR error is produced. Rule-based formatters only understand NumberFormatter::DEFAULT_RULESET and NumberFormatter::PUBLIC_RULESETS.
trans-unit.target: 设置与格式化程序关联的文本属性。文本属性的一个示例是正数的后缀。如果格式化程序不了解该属性， U_UNSUPPORTED_ERROR 产生U_UNSUPPORTED_ERROR错误。基于规则的格式化程序仅了解 NumberFormatter::DEFAULT_RULESET 和 NumberFormatter::PUBLIC_RULESETS 。

trans-unit.source: Set all options (report all)
trans-unit.target: 设置所有选项(全部报告)

trans-unit.source: Set an identifier for a simple worker.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个简单工人的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Set base URI, base URI is used when doing routing, in routing phase request URI is used to route a request, while base URI is used to skip the leadding part(base URI) of request URI. That is, if comes a request with request URI a/b/c, then if you set base URI to "a/b", only "/c" will be used in routing phase.
trans-unit.target: 设置基数URI,基数URI在路由时使用,在路由阶段,请求URI用于路由请求,而基数URI用于跳过请求URI的前导部分(基数URI),也就是说,如果请求URI为a/b/c,则在路由阶段只使用"/c"。也就是说,如果一个请求的URI为a/b/c,那么如果将base URI设置为 "a/b",那么在路由阶段将只使用"/c"。

trans-unit.source: Set callback function for LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE command
trans-unit.target: 设置LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE命令的回调功能。

trans-unit.source: Set close-on-exec flag on the opened file descriptor. Only available in PHP compiled on POSIX.1-2008 conform systems.
trans-unit.target: 在打开的文件描述符上设置close-on-exec标志。仅在POSIX.1-2008编译的PHP符合系统中可用。

trans-unit.source: Set containing the values to exclude.
trans-unit.target: 包含要排除的值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Set content to response
trans-unit.target: 设置内容为响应

trans-unit.source: Set cookie parameters defined in the php.ini file. The effect of this function only lasts for the duration of the script. Thus, you need to call session_set_cookie_params() for every request and before session_start() is called.
trans-unit.target: 设置在 php.ini 文件中定义的cookie参数。此功能的效果仅在脚本期间持续。因此，你需要调用session_set_cookie_params（）为每个请求和之前在session_start（）被调用。

trans-unit.source: Set error handler for Yaf. when application.dispatcher.throwException is off, Yaf will trigger catchable error while unexpected errors occrred.
trans-unit.target: 为Yaf设置错误处理程序。当application.dispatcher.throwException关闭时，Yaf将在发生意外错误时触发可捕获的错误。

trans-unit.source: Set event listener's error callback
trans-unit.target: 设置事件监听器的错误回调

trans-unit.source: Set event priority.
trans-unit.target: 设置事件优先级。

trans-unit.source: Set if the query will be boosted by the interesting term relevance
trans-unit.target: 设置查询是否会被有趣的词关联性所提升

trans-unit.source: Set it to TRUE if you want name to be of type ID, FALSE otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望 name 为ID类型，则将其设置为 TRUE ,否则将其设置为 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Set it to TRUE to load external entities from a doctype declaration. This is useful for including character entities in your XML document.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为 TRUE 可从doctype声明中加载外部实体。这对于在XML文档中包含字符实体很有用。

trans-unit.source: Set methods
trans-unit.target: 设置方法

trans-unit.source: Set parser options. The options must be set after XMLReader::open() or XMLReader::xml() are called and before the first XMLReader::read() call.
trans-unit.target: 设置解析器选项。必须在调用XMLReader :: open（）或XMLReader :: xml（）之后且在第一个XMLReader :: read（）调用之前设置选项。

trans-unit.source: Set the 'ndots' parameter for searches. Sets the number of dots which, when found in a name, causes the first query to be without any search domain.
trans-unit.target: 设置搜索的 'ndots' 参数。设置点名的数量，当在名称中找到该点时，将导致第一个查询没有任何搜索域。

trans-unit.source: Set the URI containing the XML document to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 设置包含要解析的XML文档的URI。

trans-unit.source: Set the alias for the Phar archive, and write it as the permanent alias for this phar archive. An alias can be used internally to a phar archive to ensure that use of the phar stream wrapper to access internal files always works regardless of the location of the phar archive on the filesystem. Another alternative is to rely upon Phar's interception of include or to use Phar::interceptFileFuncs() and use relative paths.
trans-unit.target: 设置Phar存档的别名，并将其写为该Phar存档的永久别名。可以在phar归档文件内部使用别名，以确保无论phar归档文件在文件系统上的位置如何，始终都可以使用phar流包装器访问内部文件。另一种选择是依靠Phar对include的拦截或使用Phar :: interceptFileFuncs（）并使用相对路径。

trans-unit.source: Set the alpha blending flag to use layering effects.
trans-unit.target: 设置alpha混合标志,使用分层效果。

trans-unit.source: Set the codepage of the current process.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前进程的代码页。

trans-unit.source: Set the comment of a ZIP archive.
trans-unit.target: 设置ZIP存档的注释。

trans-unit.source: Set the comment of an entry defined by its index.
trans-unit.target: 设置由其索引定义的条目的注释。

trans-unit.source: Set the comment of an entry defined by its name.
trans-unit.target: 设置由其名称定义的条目的注释。

trans-unit.source: Set the compression method of an entry defined by its index.
trans-unit.target: 设置由其索引定义的条目的压缩方式。

trans-unit.source: Set the compression method of an entry defined by its name.
trans-unit.target: 设置由名称定义的条目的压缩方式。

trans-unit.source: Set the current active configuration setting of magic_quotes_runtime.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前的活动配置设置magic_quotes_runtime。

trans-unit.source: Set the data containing a RelaxNG Schema to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: 设置包含RelaxNG Schema的数据用于验证。

trans-unit.source: Set the data containing the XML to parse.
trans-unit.target: 设置包含要解析的XML的数据。

trans-unit.source: Set the default stream context which will be used whenever file operations (fopen(), file_get_contents(), etc...) are called without a context parameter. Uses the same syntax as stream_context_create().
trans-unit.target: 设置默认流上下文，该上下文将在没有上下文参数的情况下调用文件操作（fopen（），file_get_contents（）等）时使用。使用与stream_context_create（）相同的语法。

trans-unit.source: Set the effective group ID of the current process. This is a privileged function and needs appropriate privileges (usually root) on the system to be able to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前进程的有效组ID。这是一个特权功能,需要系统中适当的权限(通常是root)才能执行此功能。

trans-unit.source: Set the effective user ID of the current process. This is a privileged function and needs appropriate privileges (usually root) on the system to be able to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前进程的有效用户ID。这是一个特权功能,需要系统中适当的权限(通常是root)才能执行此功能。

trans-unit.source: Set the encryption method of an entry defined by its index.
trans-unit.target: 设置由其索引定义的条目的加密方法。

trans-unit.source: Set the encryption method of an entry defined by its name.
trans-unit.target: 设置由名称定义的条目的加密方法。

trans-unit.source: Set the escape character (one character only). Defaults as a backslash (\)
trans-unit.target: 设置转义字符（仅一个字符）。默认为反斜杠（\）

trans-unit.source: Set the external attributes of an entry defined by its index.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个条目的外部属性,由其索引定义。

trans-unit.source: Set the external attributes of an entry defined by its name.
trans-unit.target: 设置名称所定义的条目的外部属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the field delimiter (one character only).
trans-unit.target: 设置字段定界符(仅一个字符)。

trans-unit.source: Set the field enclosure character (one character only).
trans-unit.target: 设置字段围栏字符(仅一个字符)。

trans-unit.source: Set the filename or URI for the RelaxNG Schema to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于验证的RelaxNG Schema的文件名或URI。

trans-unit.source: Set the flags for the CachingIterator object.
trans-unit.target: 设置CachingIterator对象的标志。

trans-unit.source: Set the flags that change the behavior of the ArrayIterator.
trans-unit.target: 设置改变ArrayIterator行为的标志。

trans-unit.source: Set the flags that change the behavior of the ArrayObject.
trans-unit.target: 设置改变ArrayObject行为的标志。

trans-unit.source: Set the iterator to the position in the image list specified with the index parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将迭代器设置到用索引参数指定的图像列表中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Set the iterator to the position in the image list specified with the index parameter. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.2.9 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 将迭代器设置到用index参数指定的图像列表中的位置。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.2.9或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Set the local IPv4 address that the resolver should bind to. The argument should contain a single numerical IPv4 address as a string.
trans-unit.target: 设置解析器应绑定的本地 IPv4 地址。参数应包含一个单一的数字 IPv4 地址,作为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Set the local IPv6 address that the resolver should bind to. The argument should contain a single numerical IPv6 address as a string.
trans-unit.target: 设置解析器应绑定的本地 IPv6 地址。参数中应包含一个字符串形式的IPv6数字地址。

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum allowed depth.
trans-unit.target: 设置最大允许深度。

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum depth. Must be greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: 设置最大深度。必须大于零。

trans-unit.source: Set the name of the network interface that the DNS resolver should bind to. This must be an interface name (not an address).
trans-unit.target: 设置 DNS 解析器应绑定到的网络接口的名称。这必须是一个接口名称(而不是地址)。

trans-unit.source: Set the number of seconds a script is allowed to run. If this is reached, the script returns a fatal error. The default limit is 30 seconds or, if it exists, the max_execution_time value defined in the php.ini.
trans-unit.target: 设置允许脚本运行的秒数。如果达到此目的，脚本将返回致命错误。默认限制为30秒，如果存在，则为 php.ini 中定义的max_execution_time值。

trans-unit.source: Set the number of similar documents to return for each result
trans-unit.target: 设置每个结果要返回的类似文档的数量。

trans-unit.source: Set the numerical stream weight (a number between 1 and 256).
trans-unit.target: 设置数字流权重(1到256之间的数字)。

trans-unit.source: Set the pattern used by the formatter
trans-unit.target: 设置格式化器使用的模式

trans-unit.source: Set the pattern used by the formatter. Can not be used on a rule-based formatter.
trans-unit.target: 设置格式化器使用的模式。不能用于基于规则的格式化器。

trans-unit.source: Set the pattern used for the IntlDateFormatter.
trans-unit.target: 设置IntlDateFormatter使用的模式。

trans-unit.source: Set the pinned public key. The string can be the file name of your pinned public key. The file format expected is "PEM" or "DER". The string can also be any number of base64 encoded sha256 hashes preceded by "sha256//" and separated by ";".
trans-unit.target: 设置钉定的公钥。字符串可以是你的钉定的公钥的文件名。文件格式应该是 "PEM "或 "DER"。字符串也可以是任意数量的base64编码的sha256哈希值,以 "sha256//"开头,用";"隔开。

trans-unit.source: Set the pixel iterator row.
trans-unit.target: 设置像素迭代器行。

trans-unit.source: Set the polygon fill rule to be used by the clipping path.
trans-unit.target: 设置剪接路径要使用的多边形填充规则。

trans-unit.source: Set the read and write timeout for a buffer event
trans-unit.target: 设置缓冲区事件的读写超时。

trans-unit.source: Set the real group ID of the current process. This is a privileged function and needs appropriate privileges (usually root) on the system to be able to perform this function. The appropriate order of function calls is posix_setgid() first, posix_setuid() last.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前进程的真实组ID。这是一项特权功能，需要系统上适当的特权（通常是root）才能执行此功能。函数调用的适当顺序是首先posix_setgid（），最后是posix_setuid（）。

trans-unit.source: Set the real user ID of the current process. This is a privileged function that needs appropriate privileges (usually root) on the system to be able to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前进程的真实用户ID。这是一个特权函数,需要系统中适当的权限(通常是root)才能执行这个函数。

trans-unit.source: Set the signature algorithm for a phar and apply it. The signature algorithm must be one of Phar::MD5, Phar::SHA1, Phar::SHA256, Phar::SHA512, or Phar::PGP (pgp not yet supported and falls back to SHA-1).
trans-unit.target: 为phar设置签名算法并应用它。签名算法必须是Phar :: MD5，Phar :: SHA1，Phar :: SHA256，Phar :: SHA512或Phar :: PGP之一（尚不支持pgp并退回到SHA-1）。

trans-unit.source: Set the stream chunk size.
trans-unit.target: 设置流的大小。

trans-unit.source: Set the templates base directory, this is usually called by Yaf_Dispatcher
trans-unit.target: 设置模板的基本目录，通常由Yaf_Dispatcher调用

trans-unit.source: Set the token and secret for subsequent requests.
trans-unit.target: 为以后的请求设置令牌和秘密。

trans-unit.source: Set the type of variable var to type.
trans-unit.target: 将变量 var 的类型设置为 type 。

trans-unit.source: Set the value of a configuration option.
trans-unit.target: 设置配置选项的值。

trans-unit.source: Set the various assert() control options or just query their current settings.
trans-unit.target: 设置各种assert（）控件选项或仅查询其当前设置。

trans-unit.source: Set this integer value to something other than zero to dither the mapped image
trans-unit.target: 将此整数值设置为零以外的其他值,对映射的图像进行抖动。

trans-unit.source: Set this parameter to TRUE to make this function return the highlighted code.
trans-unit.target: 将此参数设置为 TRUE 可使此函数返回突出显示的代码。

trans-unit.source: Set this to 1 for reverse sorting
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为1,用于反向排序

trans-unit.source: Set this to TRUE to get the real size of memory allocated from system. If not set or FALSE only the memory used by emalloc() is reported.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为 TRUE 可获取从系统分配的实际内存大小。如果未设置或为 FALSE ,则仅报告emalloc（）使用的内存。

trans-unit.source: Set this to TRUE to get total memory allocated from system, including unused pages. If not set or FALSE only the used memory is reported.

trans-unit.target: 设置指定colormap索引的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color used for stroking object outlines.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于描边对象轮廓的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the colormap index of the pixel wand.
trans-unit.target: 设置像素棒的彩色地图索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the consumer handler callback, which will later be called with OAuthProvider::callConsumerHandler().
trans-unit.target: 设置使用者处理程序回调，稍后将使用OAuthProvider :: callConsumerHandler（）进行调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current strategy for dealing with wall times that are repeated whenever the clock is set back during dailight saving time end transitions. The default value is IntlCalendar::WALLTIME_LAST (take the post-DST instant). The other possible value is IntlCalendar::WALLTIME_FIRST (take the instant that occurs during DST).
trans-unit.target: 设置当前的策略以处理在夏时制时间结束转换期间每当时钟调回一次时重复的挂钟时间。默认值为 IntlCalendar::WALLTIME_LAST （采用DST后的瞬间）。另一个可能的值是 IntlCalendar::WALLTIME_FIRST （获取DST期间发生的瞬间）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current strategy for dealing with wall times that are skipped whenever the clock is forwarded during dailight saving time start transitions. The default value is IntlCalendar::WALLTIME_LAST (take it as being the same instant as the one when the wall time is one hour more). Alternative values are IntlCalendar::WALLTIME_FIRST (same instant as the one with a wall time of one hour less) and IntlCalendar::WALLTIME_NEXT_VALID (same instant as when DST begins).
trans-unit.target: 设置当前的策略，以处理在夏时制开始过渡期间每转发时钟都会跳过的墙上时间。默认值为 IntlCalendar::WALLTIME_LAST （将其与壁挂时间增加一小时时的瞬间相同）。其他值包括 IntlCalendar::WALLTIME_FIRST （与壁挂时间短一小时的时间相同）和 IntlCalendar::WALLTIME_NEXT_VALID （与DST开始时相同）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the date and time based on an Unix timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 根据Unix时间戳设置日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default amount of slop on phrase queries built with "pf", "pf2" and/or "pf3" fields (affects boosting). "ps" parameter
trans-unit.target: 设置用 "pf"、"pf2 "和/或 "pf3 "字段建立的短语查询的默认倾斜量(影响提升)。"ps "参数

trans-unit.source: Sets the default character set to be used when sending data from and to the database server.
trans-unit.target: 设置从数据库服务器发送数据和向数据库服务器发送数据时要使用的默认字符集。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default exception handler if an exception is not caught within a try/catch block. Execution will stop after the exception_handler is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果在try / catch块中未捕获到异常，则设置默认的异常处理程序。调用 exception_handler 后，执行将停止。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default handler function for the XML parser parser.
trans-unit.target: 设置XML解析器 parser 的默认处理函数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default options described by options for multibyte regex functions.
trans-unit.target: 设置所描述的默认选项 options 多字节正则表达式的功能。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default runtime locale to $locale. This changes the value of INTL global 'default_locale' locale identifier. UAX #35 extensions are accepted.
trans-unit.target: 将默认的运行时locale设置为$locale。这将改变INTL全局'default_locale'locale标识符的值。接受 UAX #35 的扩展。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default scale parameter for all subsequent calls to bc math functions that do not explicitly specify a scale parameter. If scale is omitted, the function gets the current scale factor.
trans-unit.target: 为所有随后未明确指定比例参数的bc数学函数的调用设置默认比例参数。如果省略 scale ，则该函数将获取当前的比例因子。

trans-unit.source: Sets the delimiter, enclosure and escape character for parsing CSV fields.
trans-unit.target: 设置解析CSV字段时的定界符、括号和转义符。

trans-unit.source: Sets the depth of a particular image channel.
trans-unit.target: 设置特定图像通道的深度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element handler functions for the XML parser. start_element_handler and end_element_handler are strings containing the names of functions that must exist when xml_parse() is called for parser.
trans-unit.target: 设置XML parser 的元素处理函数。 start_element_handler 和 end_element_handler 是包含在 parser 调用xml_parse（）时必须存在的函数名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the encoding for input/output documents.
trans-unit.target: 设置输入/输出文档的编码。

trans-unit.source: Sets the endpoint URL that will be touched by following SOAP requests. This is equivalent to specifying the location option when constructing the SoapClient.
trans-unit.target: 设置以下SOAP请求将触摸的端点URL。这等效于构造SoapClient时指定location选项。

trans-unit.source: Sets the expand.q parameter.
trans-unit.target: 设置expand.q参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the explainOther common query parameter
trans-unit.target: 设置explainOther通用查询参数

trans-unit.source: Sets the external entity reference handler function for the XML parser parser.
trans-unit.target: 为XML解析器 parser 设置外部实体引用处理程序函数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the facet.date.other parameter. Accepts an optional field override
trans-unit.target: 设置facet.date.other参数。接受可选的字段覆盖

trans-unit.source: Sets the field cursor to the given offset. The next call to mysqli_fetch_field() will retrieve the field definition of the column associated with that offset.
trans-unit.target: 将字段光标设置为给定的偏移量。对mysqli_fetch_field（）的下一次调用将检索与该偏移量关联的列的字段定义。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file position indicator for handle to the beginning of the file stream.
trans-unit.target: 将 handle 的文件位置指示符设置为文件流的开头。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file position indicator for the file referenced by handle. The new position, measured in bytes from the beginning of the file, is obtained by adding offset to the position specified by whence.
trans-unit.target: 设置 handle 引用的文件的文件位置指示符。新位置（从文件开头算起，以字节为单位）是通过将 offset 添加到 whence 指定的位置而获得的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file position indicator for the given file pointer to the given offset byte into the file stream. Equivalent to calling (in C) gzseek(zp, offset, SEEK_SET).
trans-unit.target: 将给定文件指针的文件位置指示符设置为文件流中给定偏移字节。等效于调用（在C中）gzseek（zp，offset，SEEK_SET）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file position indicator of the given gz-file pointer to the beginning of the file stream.
trans-unit.target: 将gz-file指针的文件位置指示器设置为文件流的开始。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file to output profiling information when processing a stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件在处理样式表时输出剖析信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets the filename before you read or write an image file.
trans-unit.target: 在读取或写入图像文件之前设置文件名。

trans-unit.source: Sets the filename of a particular image in a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 设置序列中特定图像的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fill color to be used for drawing filled objects.

trans-unit.source: Sets the fill rule to use while drawing polygons.

trans-unit.source: Sets the flags to be used by the SplFileObject.
trans-unit.target: 设置SplFileObject使用的标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flags.
trans-unit.target: 设置标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font family to use when annotating with text.
trans-unit.target: 设置用文字注释时要使用的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font pointsize to use when annotating with text.
trans-unit.target: 设置用文字注释时要使用的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font stretch to use when annotating with text. The AnyStretch enumeration acts as a wild-card "don't care" option.
trans-unit.target: 设置文本注释时要使用的字体伸缩。AnyStretch枚举作为一个通配符 "不关心 "选项。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font style to use when annotating with text. The AnyStyle enumeration acts as a wild-card "don't care" option.
trans-unit.target: 设置文本注释时要使用的字体样式。AnyStyle枚举作为一个通配符 "不关心 "选项。

trans-unit.source: Sets the format of the Imagick object.
trans-unit.target: 设置Imagick对象的格式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the frequency at which words will be ignored which do not occur in at least this many docs.
trans-unit.target: 设置至少在这么多文档中没有出现的单词被忽略的频率。

trans-unit.source: Sets the frequency below which terms will be ignored in the source docs
trans-unit.target: 设置源文档中忽略术语的频率。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fully-specified font to use when annotating with text
trans-unit.target: 设置用文本注释时要使用的完全指定的字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fully-specified font to use when annotating with text.
trans-unit.target: 设置用文字注释时要使用的完全指定的字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the global colorspace value for the object. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.5.7 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 设置对象的全局色彩空间值。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.5.7或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the global gravity property for the Imagick object. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.4.0 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Imagick 对象的全局重力属性。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.4.0或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the gravity property for the current image. This method can be used to set the gravity property for a single image sequence. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.4.4 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前图像的重力属性。本方法可用于设置单个图像序列的重力属性。如果 Imagick 是根据 ImageMagick 6.4.4 或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the group.format parameter. If this parameter is set to simple, the grouped documents are presented in a single flat list, and the start and rows parameters affect the numbers of documents instead of groups. Accepts: grouped/simple
trans-unit.target: 设置group.format参数。如果将此参数设置为简单,则分组后的文档将以单个平面列表的形式显示,开始和行参数影响的是文档的数量而不是分组。接受:grouped/simple

trans-unit.source: Sets the group.offset parameter.
trans-unit.target: 设置group.offset参数。

trans-unit.target: 设置图像色彩空间。创建新图像时应使用此方法。要更改现有图像的色彩空间，应使用Imagick :: transformImageColorspace（）。

trans-unit.target: 设置图像合成运算符。

trans-unit.target: 设置图像压缩质量。

trans-unit.target: 设置图像延迟

trans-unit.target: 设置图像延迟。对于动画图像来说,这是图像的这一帧在显示下一帧之前应该显示的时间量。

trans-unit.target: 设置图像深度

trans-unit.source: Sets the image depth.

trans-unit.target: 设置图像处理方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the image gamma.
trans-unit.target: 设置图像伽玛。

trans-unit.source: Sets the image interpolate pixel method.
trans-unit.target: 设置图像插值像素方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the image iterations.

trans-unit.target: 设置图像的哑光通道。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.2.9或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the image size (i.e. columns & rows).
trans-unit.target: 设置图像大小（即列和行）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the image to the specified opacity level. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.3.1 or newer. This method operates on all channels, which means that for example opacity value of 0.5 will set all transparent areas to partially opaque. To add transparency to areas that are not already transparent use Imagick::evaluateImage()
trans-unit.target: 将图像设置为指定的不透明度级别。如果Imagick已针对ImageMagick 6.3.1版或更高版本进行编译，则此方法可用。此方法在所有通道上运行，这意味着例如不透明度值为0.5会将所有透明区域设置为部分不透明。要为尚未透明的区域添加透明度，请使用Imagick :: evaluateImage（）

trans-unit.target: 设置图像虚拟像素方法。

trans-unit.target: 设置字段的索引时间提升值。这将取代该字段的当前提升值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the initial size of the collapse data structures when collapsing on a numeric field only
trans-unit.target: 当只对数值字段进行折叠时,设置折叠数据结构的初始大小。

trans-unit.target: 当只对数值字段进行折叠时,设置折叠数据结构的初始大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the instant represented by this object. The instant is represented by a float whose value should be an integer number of milliseconds since the epoch (1 Jan 1970 00:00:00.000 UTC), ignoring leap seconds. All the field values will be recalculated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 设置此对象表示的瞬间。该瞬间由一个浮点数表示，其值应为自该纪元（1970年1月1日00：00：00.000 UTC）以来的整数毫秒，忽略leap秒。所有字段值将相应地重新计算。

trans-unit.source: Sets the interlace scheme of the image.

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum doc frequency to return in order to be included
trans-unit.target: 设置返回的最小文档频率,以便被收录。

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum document frequency used for determining term count
trans-unit.target: 设置用于确定术语计数的最小文件频率。

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum word length below which words will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 设置最小字数长度,低于此长度的字数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Sets the smallest number of days the first week of a year or month must have in the new year or month. For instance, in the Gregorian calendar, if this value is 1, then the first week of the year will necessarily include January 1st, while if this value is 7, then the week with January 1st will be the first week of the year only if the day of the week for January 1st matches the day of the week returned by IntlCalendar::getFirstDayOfWeek(); otherwise it will be the previous yearʼs last week.
trans-unit.target: 设置一年或一个月的第一周在新的一年或新月必须具有的最少天数。例如，在公历中，如果该值为1，则该年的第一周必须包括1月1日；而如果该值为7，则只有在以下情况下，具有1月1日的那一周才是该年的第一周。 1月1日的星期几与IntlCalendar :: getFirstDayOfWeek（）返回的星期几匹配；否则将是前一年的上周。

trans-unit.source: Setting certain environment variables may be a potential security breach. The safe_mode_allowed_env_vars directive contains a comma-delimited list of prefixes. In Safe Mode, the user may only alter environment variables whose names begin with the prefixes supplied by this directive. By default, users will only be able to set environment variables that begin with PHP_ (e.g. PHP_FOO=BAR). Note: if this directive is empty, PHP will let the user modify ANY environment variable!

trans-unit.source: Setting this parameter to a number greater than 0 enables caching for result grouping. Result Grouping executes two searches; this option caches the second search. The server default value is 0. Testing has shown that group caching only improves search time with Boolean, wildcard, and fuzzy queries. For simple queries like term or "match all" queries, group caching degrades performance. group.cache.percent parameter
trans-unit.target: 将此参数设置为大于0的数字,可以实现结果分组的缓存。结果分组会执行两次搜索,此选项可以缓存第二次搜索。测试表明,分组缓存仅能改善布尔、通配符和模糊查询的搜索时间。对于简单的查询,如术语或 "匹配所有 "查询,分组缓存会降低性能。 group.cache.percent参数

trans-unit.target: 也可以使用几种PCRE修饰符。

trans-unit.source: Several assertions (of any sort) may occur in succession. For example, (?<=\d{3})(?<!999)foo matches "foo" preceded by three digits that are not "999". Notice that each of the assertions is applied independently at the same point in the subject string. First there is a check that the previous three characters are all digits, then there is a check that the same three characters are not "999". This pattern does not match "foo" preceded by six characters, the first of which are digits and the last three of which are not "999". For example, it doesn't match "123abcfoo". A pattern to do that is (?<=\d{3}...)(?<!999)foo
trans-unit.target: 可能会连续出现几个断言。例如，（？<= \ d {3}）（？<！999）foo匹配“ foo”，后跟三个不是“ 999”的数字。注意，每个断言都独立地应用于主题字符串中的同一点。首先检查前三个字符是否都是数字，然后检查相同的三个字符是否不是“ 999”。此模式与以六个字符开头的“ foo”不匹配，前六个字符是数字，最后三个字符不是“ 999”。例如，它与“ 123abcfoo”不匹配。做到这一点的模式是（？<= \ d {3} ...）（？<！999）foo

trans-unit.target: 锐化图像。我们用给定半径和标准差(sigma)的高斯算子对图像进行卷积。为了得到合理的结果,半径应该大于 sigma。使用半径为 0,Imagick::UnsharpMaskImage()为你选择一个合适的半径。

trans-unit.source: Sharpens an image. We convolve the image with a Gaussian operator of the given radius and standard deviation (sigma). For reasonable results, the radius should be larger than sigma. Use a radius of 0 and Imagick::sharpenImage() selects a suitable radius for you.

trans-unit.source: Shines a distant light on an image to create a three-dimensional effect. You control the positioning of the light with azimuth and elevation; azimuth is measured in degrees off the x axis and elevation is measured in pixels above the Z axis. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.2.9 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 将远处的光线照射在图像上,以产生三维效果。您可以用方位角和仰角来控制光线的位置;方位角的测量单位是偏离 x 轴的度数,仰角的测量单位是 Z 轴上方的像素。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.2.9或更新的版本编译的,则可使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Simulates a pencil sketch. We convolve the image with a Gaussian operator of the given radius and standard deviation (sigma). For reasonable results, radius should be larger than sigma. Use a radius of 0 and Imagick::sketchImage() selects a suitable radius for you. Angle gives the angle of the blurring motion. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.2.9 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 模拟一个铅笔草图。我们用给定半径和标准差(sigma)的高斯算子对图像进行卷积。为了得到合理的结果,半径应该大于sigma。使用半径为0,Imagick::sketchImage()为你选择一个合适的半径。Angle给出了模糊运动的角度。如果 Imagick 是针对 ImageMagick 6.2.9 或更新版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Simulates a signal receive. It is safe to call this function at any time, from any context, including signal handlers or random threads. Its main use is to customise signal handling in the process.

trans-unit.source: Simulates an image shadow.
trans-unit.target: 模拟图像阴影。

trans-unit.source: Simulates motion blur. We convolve the image with a Gaussian operator of the given radius and standard deviation (sigma). For reasonable results, radius should be larger than sigma. Use a radius of 0 and MotionBlurImage() selects a suitable radius for you. Angle gives the angle of the blurring motion.
trans-unit.target: 模拟运动模糊。我们用给定半径和标准差(sigma)的高斯算子对图像进行卷积。为了得到合理的结果,半径应该大于sigma。使用半径为0,MotionBlurImage()为你选择一个合适的半径。角度给出了模糊运动的角度。

trans-unit.source: Since escapeshellcmd() is applied automatically, some characters that are allowed as email addresses by internet RFCs cannot be used. mail() can not allow such characters, so in programs where the use of such characters is required, alternative means of sending emails (such as using a framework or a library) is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Since PHP 5, new returns a reference automatically, so using =& in this context is deprecated and produces an E_DEPRECATED message in PHP 5.3 and later, and an E_STRICT message in earlier versions. As of PHP 7.0 it is syntactically invalid. (Technically, the difference is that, in PHP 5, object variables, much like resources, are a mere pointer to the actual object data, so these object references are not "references" in the same sense used before (aliases). For more information, see Objects and references.)
trans-unit.target: 由于PHP 5，新自动返回基准，因此，使用=＆在此上下文中已过时，产生 E_DEPRECATED 在PHP 5.3消息和以后，和 E_STRICT 在较早版本的消息。从PHP 7.0开始，它在语法上无效。 （从技术上讲，区别在于，在PHP 5中，对象变量与资源非常相似，仅是指向实际对象数据的指针，因此这些对象引用不是“引用”，其含义与之前（别名）相同。有关更多信息信息，请参阅对象和引用。）

trans-unit.source: Since PHP 5.1.0 (when the date/time functions were rewritten), every call to a date/time function will generate a E_NOTICE if the timezone isn't valid, and/or a E_WARNING message if using the system settings or the TZ environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.1.0起（重写日期/时间函数时），如果时区无效，则每次对日期/时间函数的调用都会生成 E_NOTICE ，如果使用系统设置或 TZ ，则每次生成 E_WARNING 消息环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Since there is no portable change notification interface available, the portable implementation simply calls stat() regularly on the path to see if it changed somehow. For this case a recommended polling interval can be specified. If one specifies a polling interval of 0.0 (highly recommended) then a suitable, unspecified default value will be used(which could be expected to be around 5 seconds, although this might change dynamically). libev will also impose a minimum interval which is currently around 0.1 , but that’s usually overkill.
trans-unit.target: 由于没有可用的可移植更改通知接口，因此可移植实现只需在路径上定期调用stat（）即可查看其是否有所更改。对于这种情况，可以指定建议的轮询间隔。如果将轮询间隔指定为 0.0 （强烈建议），则将使用合适的，未指定的默认值（该值可能会在5秒左右，尽管可能会动态变化）。libev还将施加一个最小间隔，该间隔当前约为 0.1 ，但这通常是过大的。

trans-unit.source: Since there should be a entry point which can be called by Yaf (as of PHP 5.3, there is a new magic method __invoke, but Yaf is not only works with PHP 5.3+, Yaf choose another magic method execute), you must implement the abstract method Yaf_Action_Abstract::execute() in your custom action class.
trans-unit.target: 由于应该有一个可以由Yaf调用的入口点（从PHP 5.3开始，有一个新的魔术方法__invoke，但是Yaf不仅适用于PHP 5.3 +，Yaf选择了另一个魔术方法execute），因此必须实现自定义操作类中的抽象方法Yaf_Action_Abstract :: execute（）。

trans-unit.source: Since this class' methods are designed to be called internally by PHP as part of the normal session workflow, child class calls to parent methods (i.e. the actual internal native handlers) will return FALSE unless the session has actually been started (either automatically, or by explicit session_start(). This is important to consider when writing unit tests where the class methods might be invoked manually.
trans-unit.target: 由于此类方法被设计为由PHP在常规会话工作流中内部调用，因此除非实际已启动会话（自动或自动），否则对父方法的子类调用（即实际的内部本机处理程序）将返回 FALSE 。通过显式session_start（），在编写单元测试（可能手动调用类方法）时要考虑这一点很重要。

trans-unit.source: Slides one edge of an image along the X or Y axis, creating a parallelogram. An X direction shear slides an edge along the X axis, while a Y direction shear slides an edge along the Y axis. The amount of the shear is controlled by a shear angle. For X direction shears, x_shear is measured relative to the Y axis, and similarly, for Y direction shears y_shear is measured relative to the X axis. Empty triangles left over from shearing the image are filled with the background color.
trans-unit.target: 沿X轴或Y轴滑动图像的一条边,形成一个平行四边形。X方向的剪切是沿着X轴滑动一个边缘,而Y方向的剪切是沿着Y轴滑动一个边缘。剪切量由剪切角控制。对于X方向的剪切,x_shear是相对于Y轴测量的,同样,对于Y方向的剪切,y_shear是相对于X轴测量的。剪切图像后留下的空三角会用背景色填充。

trans-unit.source: Socket node type
trans-unit.target: 插座节点类型

trans-unit.source: Socket option level. See the socket(7) manual page. (Added in event-1.6.0.)
trans-unit.target: 套接字选项级别。请参见socket（7）手册页。（在事件1.6.0中添加。）

trans-unit.source: Socket option. Enable sending of keep-alive messages on connection-oriented sockets. Expects an integer boolean flag. See the socket(7) manual page. (Added in event-1.6.0.)
trans-unit.target: 套接字选项。启用在面向连接的套接字上发送保持活动消息。需要一个整数布尔值标志。请参见socket（7）手册页。（在事件1.6.0中添加。）

trans-unit.source: Socket option. Enable socket debugging. Only allowed for processes with the CAP_NET_ADMIN capability or an effective user ID of 0 . (Added in event-1.6.0.)
trans-unit.target: 套接字选项。启用套接字调试。仅允许具有CAP_NET_ADMIN功能或有效用户ID为 0 的进程。（在事件1.6.0中添加。）

trans-unit.source: Socket option. Indicates that the rules used in validating addresses supplied in a bind(2) call should allow reuse of local addresses. See the socket(7) manual page. (Added in event-1.6.0.)
trans-unit.target: 套接字选项。指示用于验证bind（2）调用中提供的地址的规则应允许重用本地地址。请参见socket（7）手册页。（在事件1.6.0中添加。）

trans-unit.source: Socket option. Reports whether transmission of broadcast messages is supported. See the socket(7) manual page. (Added in event-1.6.0.)
trans-unit.target: 套接字选项。报告是否支持广播消息的传输。请参见socket（7）手册页。（在事件1.6.0中添加。）

trans-unit.source: Socket option. See the socket(7) manual page. (Added in event-1.6.0.)
trans-unit.target: 套接字选项。请参见socket（7）手册页。（在事件1.6.0中添加。）

trans-unit.source: Socket option. When enabled, a close(2) or shutdown(2) will not return until all queued messages for the socket have been successfully sent or the linger timeout has been reached. Otherwise, the call returns immediately and the closing is done in the background. See the socket(7) manual page. (Added in event-1.6.0.)
trans-unit.target: 套接字选项。启用后，close（2）或shutdown（2）不会返回，直到成功发送了套接字的所有排队消息或达到了超时为止。否则，该调用将立即返回，并在后台完成关闭。请参见socket（7）手册页。（在事件1.6.0中添加。）

trans-unit.source: Socket resource or stream.
trans-unit.target: Socket资源或流。

trans-unit.source: Socket resource, stream or a file descriptor of a socket.
trans-unit.target: 套接字资源、流或套接字的文件描述符。

trans-unit.source: Socket resource, stream or numeric file descriptor associated normally associated with a socket.
trans-unit.target: 套接字资源,流或数字文件描述符通常与套接字相关联。

trans-unit.source: Socket resource, stream or numeric file descriptor representing a socket ready to accept connections.
trans-unit.target: 套接字资源,流或数字文件描述符,代表一个准备接受连接的套接字。

trans-unit.source: Socket resource, stream, or numeric file descriptor associated with the socket.
trans-unit.target: 与套接字相关的套接字资源、流或数字文件描述符。

trans-unit.source: Socket resource, stream, or numeric file descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Socket资源、流或数字文件描述符。

trans-unit.source: Socket to use for this SSL. Can be stream or socket resource, numeric file descriptor, or NULL. If socket is NULL, it is assumed that the file descriptor for the socket will be assigned later, for instance, by means of EventBufferEvent::connectHost() method.
trans-unit.target: 用于此SSL的套接字。可以是流或套接字资源，数字文件描述符或 NULL 。如果 socket 为 NULL ，则假定稍后将通过EventBufferEvent :: connectHost（）方法分配套接字的文件描述符。
